comments.body: Does this change fixes a previous limitation that was assuming equal bin widths (using now pbinv[ibin] instead of pbinv[1] ?

Yes it does, maybe I forgot to write about it in the log. The third overload of `RooDataHist::sum()` implemented this already correctly:
https://github.com/root-project/root/blob/master/roofit/roofitcore/src/RooDataHist.cxx#L1663
